item.title: key demands presented to Bandi
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Jogulamba Gadwal District BJP Secretary, D K Snigdha Reddy, extended a grand welcome to Union Minister of State for Home Affairs, Bandi Sanjay Kumar, during his official visit to the district on Friday.
The minister arrived at the district to participate in an official programme, which was later cancelled due to the passing of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh. During his visit, local advocates presented a memorandum requesting that the District Court building be constructed in Gadwa...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
